name: Foodfall (Pandamedic)
description:
This game was created by Pandamedic with the help from the Unity Game Engine!!

Hello everyone!! I have created another small, fun game in Unity so you guys can enjoy life!! The game is totally FREE to download for everyone!! I worked really long hours debugging and writing my own scripts, some with Unity, but overall was a really good experience for me!! I learned a lot of new things like passing on music from one scene to another and more stuff like that!! I can't wait for what you guys think about my game so please do leave a rating after trying my game!! Thank you everyone for all the support for the last few months and I will be creating more games in the near future!!! Thank you!!

Controls:

Click mouse to destroy objects!!

Score counter:

Sandwich = 3 pts

Cookie = 5 pts

Pizza = 10 pts

BOMB = -10 pts

Discord:

Join my Discord server to be a true boner!!  https://discord.gg/kph356aEUV
